ValidationRule.description: Can't set a stage to Won if a budget does not exist, only on construction jobs.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (Work_Authorization__c = FALSE || (ISPICKVAL(Budget__c, 'Not Created')&& NOT(ISPICKVAL(Estimate_Type__c, 'T&M')))) && Estimate_Only__c = FALSE && ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Won') && ISPICKVAL(Division__c, 'Construction') && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2019,06,25)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Budget must exist and the "Work Auth Signed" box checked by the RM before setting stage to Won.
